greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = A048730(n)/4.
comment: A048715 gives all n for which a(n) = 0, A048717 gives all n for which a(n) = n.
program: (PARI) a(n)=(7*n - bitxor(n, bitxor(2*n, 4*n)))/4 \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Oct 03 2016
results.author: Antti Karttunen
